description.lang: The HSGW is a multi-functional RF, and Z-Wave IP/4G smart home security gateway, providing comprehensive solutions of home security, live visual monitoring, home automation, energy management, emergency safety monitoring, senior care, and remote management, to bring all-around convenience, comfort and safety. The HSGW adopts Climaxs groundbreaking Security@2km Wireless Technology that delivers up to 2km (1.5 miles) long RF communication, fast signal transmission, and relentless reliability. The HSGW features a loud built-in siren to blare out immediate warning when emergencies occur, and also have a rechargeable battery backup, so the gateway will always keep working even when the power is out. When it comes to your security system, there is no room for error.
